pullrequest.title: new atlas sim interface 1.1.1 with yawed step fix issue #311

content.raw: I have a concern about merging this so late in the game. Mainly we only have one more day of the Practice Session and would like to be spending that time testing our algorithms. We feel that we've worked around this issue, and we would feel very nervous about using a different version of the library, even if it supposedly does not change the Multi-Step behavior, which we are using. We've all experienced those times where we make a change in one place and it causes some bug to pop up in another place. @bchevalier, the reporter of this issue, is also on our team.
content.html: I have a concern about merging this so late in the game. Mainly we only have one more day of the Practice Session and would like to be spending that time testing our algorithms. We feel that we've worked around this issue, and we would feel very nervous about using a different version of the library, even if it supposedly does not change the Multi-Step behavior, which we are using. We've all experienced those times where we make a change in one place and it causes some bug to pop up in another place. @bchevalier, the reporter of this issue, is also on our team.
